attributes.action: Tell us why Russian female dancers are more dangerous than Islamic fundamentalist terrorists and have to be barred from the country.
attributes.additional_details: Our government are STILL (in direct contravention of the wishes of the people of this country) encouraging them to come here and nurturing, succouring and protecting terrorists, murderers and rapists from the justice of their own country but will not allow a female Russian who wants to come here to participate in a dance competition, then go home 4 days later, to come into the country.  What is it about these policies which reinforces our opinion that our dishonourable electeds have REALLY lost the plot.
